name: Lario's Slide
description:
Jam entry for: https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022

Jam Theme: DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

Developement: 4 days; Engine: Unity; 

All is wonderful in the world of Super Lario. Jumping around, picking shrooms, stomping on Boombas, all that good stuff. Except, what's this!? The Boombas have hired an assassin? Lario's in Purgatory? Infinite slide levels? Oh my! 

Help Lario escape purgatory and return to his super life in his super world.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Camera: Mouse
  • Jump: Space
  • Run: Shift
  • Level Skip: 'P'
  • Quit: Escape

If you have a 4K display, try the windowed version, included in the downloads. Gameplay can be choppy on super high resolution setups in fullscreen. Thanks for playing! Player's, avoid the source download. That's included for the judge's benefit. It will not play, and many of the assets have been redacted due to their individual licenses.
